title: Rotating Gamemode release times
body: Can anyone tell me what time of the day rotating gamemodes come out usually?(Please also state your time zone)

replies.body: Rotating game modes should begin on Friday afternoon and end on Monday morning for each region.  We have [rotating game mode FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210354503-Rotating-Game-Modes-FAQ) which has some more details on this and more!  I hope that helps, but let me know if you have any questions!
